subject: p13606683
Findings: PA and lateral chest radiographs demonstrate mild hyperinflation, consistent with known emphysema. Additionally, interstitial edema, small right pleural effusion, and mild cardiomegaly are new when compared to. Left basilar scarring and pleural thickening are chronic. Median sternotomy wires and aortic prosthesis are unchanged. There is no focal consolidation or pneumothorax.
Impression: CHF with interstitial edema superimposed upon baseline emphysema.
